# PySelector (WIP)## ðŸŒŸ About`pyselector` is a Python wrapper for the `rofi`, `dmenu`, `fzf` application,which provides a simple and efficient way to display a list of items for userselection.## ðŸ“¦ InstallationTo install `pyselector`, you can use pip:```shpip install pyselector```## ðŸ”— References- [dmenu](https://tools.suckless.org/dmenu/)- [Rofi](https://github.com/davatorium/rofi)- [fzf](https://github.com/junegunn/fzf) _(WIP)_
